Dear Biliana / Dear Iskra,

 

We have completed our April deliveries to TIBIEL. We therefore send you our attached documents issued as per contract 2620TS000019 and according to the Escrow Agreement & Addendum, together with our release request for funds deposited on the Escrow Account.

 

The statement of deliveries is showing all quantities submitted in April: 3’50’000 KWh/day from 01.04-01.05.2020 (totally 105’000 MWh). 

 

Please confirm that the attached documents are in order and transfer the amount of EUR 1’244’250.00 to our Kolmar NL B.V. account with Credit Europe Bank N.V. Amsterdam in line with our attached instructions. 

 

Please confirm the balance left on the Escrow account after payment in order to obtain TBL’s agreement to keep the balance on the Escrow account.

As per our files there should be a balance of EUR 45’681.62 after this draw down.

 

Thanks and best regards,

Silvia Lüdin
